comment.brief: Fully covers a @Shape (such as a [Card](api:alive/card), @Circle or @Rectangle) with an image.
comment.full:
Fully covers a @Shape (such as a [Card](api:alive/card), @Circle or @Rectangle) with an image.

This is simply an @ImageFill with `StretchMode="UniformToFill"` and is included for convenience.

    <Alive.Card>
        <Alive.ImageFill File="Assets/image.jpg" />
    </Alive.Card>
